name: Craft Of Mine
storyline: Your uncle, an employee from Mojang Studios, the company that develops Minecraft; has disappeared with no seeming reason. Sad for your uncle, you go to your room to play that same game, still unknowing of the answers you would be getting.
summary: Your uncle, an employee from Mojang Studios, the company that develops Minecraft; has disappeared with no seeming reason. Sad for your uncle, you go to your room to play that same game, still unknowing of the answers you would be getting.
